translation.en: Alpha Base, still no sign of the creature.

- I prepared you a light lunch. -
Here you go, chubby.
Is that a muffin- top I see?

translation.en: But you can start flossing with this.
Or not.
Time to wake up the babies.

translation.en: Wake up the babies?
Oh, cool.
Whenever they refer to weapons as babies, you know it's gonna be sick.

translation.en: Dude, are you kidding me?
You're at the second to last level of Planet Master.

translation.en: Nobody's ever made it this far.
That's why my screen name is Fearless and not Buckethead.

translation.en: You've gotta come up with a better name than Buckethead.
Why? His head is an empty bucket.

translation.en: - Shut your face. - Watch the tail.
- Watch it. - The spikes are poisonous.
Let the man concentrate.
Yeah, you're talking to the guy who jumped a rocket cycle over Apocalypse Canyon.

translation.en: Okay, let's wake up the babies. What could they be?
Sonic blast cannons? Plasma laser disintegrators? Molten molecule melters?
Welcome to Bring Your Children to Work Day.
translation.es: Bienvenidos al Día de hijos en el trabajo.

translation.en: - Real... babies? - This has gotta be a joke.
What do these babies have, superpower puke?
I climbed to the top of the toughest video game ever made just to change diapers and sing lullabies?

translation.en: All right, kids, let's see if you remember what Daddy's been teaching you after nap time.

translation.en: - Little bigger than a salad fork, buddy. - Ah!
Ah, you'll get there.
Trust me, kids, when you get bigger, so will your powers. Watch Daddy.

translation.en: Can we blow something up? These babies are boring.
They'll cost me the mission. Isn't there a space stroller I can put these kids in?

translation.en: You hit that final level. You're a gamer god!
translation.es: ¡Llegaste al último nivel! ¡Eres el dios de los jugadores!

translation.en: Call me Fearless. Nothing can stop me now.

translation.en: Nothing!
Oh, except her.
- Hey, Mom. - Hi, sweetie.Just checkin' in.

translation.en: I wanna make sure you're not playing video games while we're gone all weekend.
translation.es: Recuerda, no juegues videojuegos mientras no estemos.

translation.en: - That's ridiculous. - And I'm reminding you
translation.es: No, para nada. Y la entrega de tu proyecto de ciencias es en dos semanas.

translation.en: that your science project is due in two weeks.
translation.es: Y la entrega de tu proyecto de ciencias es en dos semanas.

translation.en: - Your partner still coming over tonight? - Yup.
- This guy's a monster. - What?
Uh, it's a monster homework assignment, and I'm on it.

translation.en: Make sure he fills out the college application!
I will, I just have to, uh, finish, a couple more things.

translation.en: - Like another video game! - I'm-- That's not what I'm doing at all.
We should go. Dad's giving the keynote in a few minutes,
translation.es: Bueno, papá está por dar su charla

translation.en: and you know how he gets gassy
translation.es: y tiene gases cuando se pone nervioso.

translation.en: - when he gets nervous. - Okay, TMI.
translation.es: y tiene gases cuando se pone nervioso. Mucha info.

translation.en: - Enjoy the weekend. Don't worry about me. - Okay. Bye, sweetie.
translation.es: - Disfruten. No se preocupen por mí. - Adiós, cariño.

translation.en: - Honey? - Yup, me too, bye.
Okay, let's finish this beast.
- Death by geyser? It's a rough way to go. -
And cue the music, that sweet sound.

translation.en: Ooh, there we go. I'm victor.
Captain Lightspeed. In my way once again.
translation.es: Capitán Lightspeed, otra vez en mi camino.

translation.en: Dr. Arcannis.
Aha. Arcannis.
- This is the guy I wanna take out. - Shoot him, man. He looks like asparagus.

translation.en: So pathetic, using your children to fight your battles for you.

translation.en: They'll probably grow up just like their father. I bet you wonder what that's like.

translation.en: This is far from over, Captain.
I will never stop until I obliterate you from the universe and conquer every planet in my path.

translation.en: You can make all the deadly threats you want. But you don't have superpowers, and you never will.

Wherever heroes are needed, we'll be there.

translation.en: I'll have all your powers and more when I take it to the next level.

translation.en: You're about to get to the final level.

translation.en: - That's crazy! - Insane!
This is big. Fearless is about to become a household name.

translation.en: Okay. Looks like I can drop them off while they grow their powers.

translation.en: And fill their diapers.
Let a babysitter change 'em, not me.

translation.en: Their powers are weak right now.
I'm hoping they can rest up and grow them here.
I hate to let them out of my sight, but I have a debriefing with the Galactic Council.

translation.en: - You got all of their snacks, right? - Yes, Captain.
In case of emergency, you can reach me using this.

translation.en: - Got it. - My interplanetary communicator. - I've seen one before. - Oh.
All right.
- There you... go. - You can let go.
Daddy loves you, baby.
Just remember that I'll always-- Okay, she's gone.
How do we get from babysitting to winning this game?

translation.en: Let's get back to blasting stuff.  I say skip all the cut scenes and get to the action.

One of these babiesmight lay an Easter egg. I don't know.

translation.en: Good point. Smart move. That's why you're number one and I'm--

translation.en: - Two thousandth and ninety- eighth. - Ouch. That hurt.
As their powers increase, we make sure each baby gets a palladium pacifier.

translation.en: This neutralizes their power, so they don't use them, accidentally.

translation.en: Of course, yes, I remember.
All of our playrooms are reinforced steel, laser- repellent, flame- retardant, earthquake- proof, radiation- proof.

- Fleech. - Ah! Focus.

- - And no, you may not eat them.
Come on.
Here.
Titus.

translation.en: Xander.
Creates anything he imagines.

translation.en: Just imagine.
Kira. The girl child of Captain Lightspeed.

I love you. You're my best fri--

- Fleech. -
Hook up the subjects to The Extrapolator.

Arcannis. You filth!

- What? - Your dad took over 20
or 30planetsbefore I locked him up.

You sit on your golden throne high above the rest of us.

I will harvest your babies' powers, and then nothing can stop me from conquering any planet I wish.

every detail, every precise calculation in my favor.

Launch code accepted.
Please hang on.

Final level.

That's freaky.
Ah, it's all hype.

- Okay. -

- Hang on. -

Melanie. Hey. Hi. Uh, come on in.
I'm not interrupting anything, am I?
No. I was just saving the world.
You know, uh, Planet Master?
I don't really play video games.
Yeah, I'm kind of a big deal online. Fearless, that's my gamer tag.

translation.en: Hmm. Yeah. I spend my time studying. Really focused on graduating right now.

translation.en: Oh, yeah, yeah, yeah. Me too.
I figure if we work on this 3 hours a night for 2 nights, we'll have this project done this weekend.

This is 30 percent of our grade, Reid. I'm taking it seriously. So let's get to brainstorming.

Like...

- Uh, the electricity of light. -

- These are just rough ideas. Oh. -

translation.en: I'm usually the only one who does any work.

That was weird.
Baby. Here from the game.  Okay…

Whoa, whoa, whoa. Bu-- Just stay.
- Ahh. - Whoa. Oh, baby.
Whoa. Don't eat...

What?

Stop with the jokes, Reid. Whose kids are these?
It might be hard to believe, but these are actually the children of… Captain Lightspeed.

translation.en: And he's in the video game.  They have super powers.

- I just have to keep them busy. - And how are you gonna do that?
Okay, toys. You want toys. Here you go.
- This is a shoe, and here is a ball. -

- - Oh, what is-- What's happening?

There's gotta be a cheat code to delete you, or...

- - Yup, that's a ball.
- - Yeah, you got it.

Oh! No, no!
What happened? Anybody hurt?
Just you. You gotta be more careful around little kids.

translation.en: with these babies. I'm gonna go work in the kitchen and get something done.

- - Oh, shrimp. Okay...

- Um. Hey, kid, why don't you just-- -

No, I've been trying to tell you, these babies are from Planet Master, the video game.

- Fine. You wanna play games? -
You can keep babysitting or whatever this is.

Video game babies.

translation.en: Captain, careful. Walking into that lair
translation.es: Capitán, cuidado. Esa guarida es como una lasaña de muerte de siete capas.

translation.en: is like walking into a seven layer lasagna of death.
translation.es: Esa guarida es como una lasaña de muerte de siete capas.

translation.en: Then get me my bib.
I'm going in to get my babies back, and it's about to get messy.
translation.es: Voy a recuperar a mis bebés y haré un chiquero.

translation.en: Nine against one? That hardly seems fair.
Looks like you guys could use a recharge.
Game on.
Power up.
Hold it down.
Sorry. Did I cut you off?
Level up.
Thanks for the workout, guys.
Palladium? I've got no powers.
Surprise.
I'm not here right now.
And neither are your precious children.
Please, make yourself at home.
If your home is a maze of merciless death traps!
translation.es: En un laberinto repleto de trampas mortales.

translation.en: I'm no good at mazes!
Ugh. Fleech.
So sorry, master.
Give me the scanner. All right, then.
This blasted planet is thick with interference.
translation.es: Este planeta está lleno de interferencia.

translation.en: Radio waves, satellite waves.
It's time for a little help from my friends.
translation.es: Es hora de un poco de ayuda.

translation.en: Hello, my darlings. Off you go.
Find my little runaways.
- Fleech, did you set this on stun? - Ah.
Hm. Yes, you did.
The pod is close.
It appears we have landed on...
- Earth? - Verr...
That's the name?
- Sounds like a stomach virus. - Ew.
Or the name of a pet worm. Or a type of mucous.
translation.es: O el nombre de un gusano o una mucosa.

translation.en: - - Uh. Yes. That's it.
When a Noglar squats in the woods...
translation.es: Un Noglar se agacha en el bosque

translation.en: it takes an earth.
Is this what I think it is?
- Oh. - You evil scum. I'm gonna blast you into the Jade Nebula when I find you.
translation.es: Escoria, te llevaré a la Nebulosa de Jade cuando te encuentre.

translation.en: - Captain Lightspeed? Is that you? - Who are you talking to?
It's the captain, you know? Remember the-- Oh.
This is Captain Darius Lightspeed, Galactic Defense Commander.
translation.es: Soy el capitán Lightspeed, comandante de la Defensa Galáctica.

translation.en: Uh, this is Reid. Senior, McKinley High School.
translation.es: Soy Reid, alumno de la secundaria McKinley.

translation.en: What have you done with my children, Reid Senior McKinley High School?
translation.es: ¿Qué hiciste con mis hijos, Reid alumno de secundaria?

translation.en: I'll vaporize you where you stand!
Hold on. We're on the same side. I've been on a hundred missions with you.
translation.es: Estamos del mismo lado. Hice 100 misiones contigo.

translation.en: Shooting plasma falcons, breaking out of gravity prison,
translation.es: Disparamos halcones, escapamos de prisión, ¿recuerdas a los gusanos?

translation.en: - remember the worm people? - Is he wearing a Danskin?
translation.es: Disparamos halcones, escapamos de prisión, ¿recuerdas a los gusanos? ¿Tiene una malla?

translation.en: It's called a uniform!
- Did I call at a bad time? - Nothin' I can't handle.
Just another day on the job.
Don't change the subject. Do you have my babies or not?
translation.es: No cambies de tema. ¿Tienes a mis bebés?

translation.en: I do have them. They've destroyed my home. You need to pick them up ASAP.
translation.es: Sí, y destruyeron mi casa. Debes venir a buscarlos.

translation.en: Reid, no other mission is more important than this.
translation.es: Reid, es la misión más importante.

translation.en: I need you to keep my kids safe.
Use their palladium pacifiers to neutralize their powers.
translation.es: Los chupetes de paladio neutralizan sus poderes.

translation.en: Right. Okay.
There's more. If you have the babies, Arcannis is coming for you.
translation.es: Hay más: si están contigo, Arcannis irá por ti.

translation.en: Arcannis, who?
Dr. Arcannis.
The most devious criminal mind in the galaxy.
translation.es: La mente más malvada de la galaxia.

translation.en: Yup, that's the guy.
Looks like the Grinch got some bad plastic surgery.
translation.es: Parece el Grinch con una mala cirugía.

translation.en: If he gets a hold of my children, he will take their powers as his own.
translation.es: Si atrapa a mis hijos, absorberá sus poderes.

translation.en: And the first planet he conquers will be yours.
translation.es: Y el primer planeta que conquiste será este.

translation.en: Okay. I'm out.
I'm afraid you've both been marked.
- I don't wanna be marked. - Well, you are.
If I can track you, so can he. He probably already knows where you are.
translation.es: Si yo puedo rastrearte, él también lo hará.

translation.en: Give me a second to trace your signal, and I'll be able to locate you.
I can't be marked. I've got my own plans. I wanna go to college.
translation.es: Imposible. Tengo otros planes. Quiero estudiar.

translation.en: I wanna get married.
I still have a $200 Sephora gift card I've never spent, and now I'm marked.
translation.es: Tengo una tarjeta de regalo que aún no gasté.

translation.en: - Dada. - No, no, no, don't!
- No! - No!
He's gone.
How's he gonna find us now?
Reid. We've gotta get out of here.
And don't think this gets you out of our science project.
translation.es: Y no creas que esto te liberará de la tarea.

translation.en: I need an ETA on the surveillance truck and an ETA on lunch.
translation.es: ¿A qué hora llegarán el camión y mi almuerzo?

translation.en: No onions on the burger this time.
No... onions.
Ah, the smell of ripe diaper.
- They were here, all right. - Yeah.
Looks just like my lab.
They are getting stronger.
We must find my little runaways quickly.
We are so close. I can smell them.
I will find you.
Do you mind?
We have to call our parents and the police. This has gone far enough.
translation.es: Debemos llamar a nuestros padres y a la policía.

translation.en: We can't call anyone. You heard Lightspeed, Arcannis is tracking us.
translation.es: No. Oíste a Lightspeed. Arcannis puede rastrearnos.

translation.en: He could be tracking our phones. You don't wanna put your family
translation.es: No. Oíste a Lightspeed. Arcannis puede rastrearnos. No quieres poner en peligro a tu familia.

translation.en: in danger too, do you? No! No kicking, please, space babies.
translation.es: No quieres poner en peligro a tu familia. Sin patear, bebés espaciales.

translation.en: Do not let them tear this car apart.
translation.es: No los dejes destrozar el auto.

translation.en: Let's find some music?
Okay. They love Lionel Richie.
- Seriously? - Hey. He's a national treasure.
These guys get it.
What is this?
Oh no.
Okay, everybody be cool. You babies, be cool.
You be cool.
Maybe we just hand these kids over to them.
Are you kidding? Have you heard what the military does to aliens?
translation.es: ¿No sabes lo que el ejército les haría?

translation.en: - Can you cut the music? - But he's a national treasure.
translation.es: - Apaga la música. - Es un clásico.

translation.en: Where're you kids going today?
- Camping! - Road trip. Uh...
- Camping road trip, to go camping. - What he said.
translation.es: - De viaje a acampar. - Sí, eso.

translation.en: Is the air safe out here?
Just a precaution. We'll ask the questions.
translation.es: Es por precaución. Yo hago las preguntas.

translation.en: We're checking cars for anything peculiar.
Nothin' peculiar here.
Uh, very, very normal car. We're all normal here. How are you?
translation.es: Un auto muy normal. Todo normal. ¿Qué tal?

translation.en: - We're gonna need to look in the trunk. - No problem.
Uh, nice mask.
Any relation to Darth?
You packed a toaster.
I've never been camping. I had no idea what I'd need.
translation.es: Nunca acampé. No sabía qué llevar.

translation.en: You've got roller skates here too.
I really didn't think it through on a lot of this. I see that now.
translation.es: Ahora veo que no lo pensé mucho.

translation.en: Is that a pool noodle?
Uhh... you never know.
So, uh, you're not much of a talker, are you?
- Hey! Stop! - Bye- bye.
Get back here with my jeep! Get back here! Hey!
Oh, we are so going to jail.
translation.es: Vamos a ir a la cárcel.

translation.en: No, no, no! I don't wanna die this way!
- No! Huh! I don't wanna die this way! No! -
- No! -
No!
What's going on here?
- How-- - What happened?
- We've gotta get back on the road. - There was a bubble.
translation.es: - Sí, debemos seguir viaje. - Era una burbuja.

translation.en: You saw a bubble?
I was in a bubble. A big purple, a big purple balloon.
translation.es: Estaba ahí dentro, como un globo gigante.

translation.en: That doesn't make sense. Does that make sense?
Nope, no sense.
I was in a big bubble. I'm serious.
It's those babies. One of 'em took my car. He chased me.
translation.es: Uno de esos bebés se llevó mi auto y me persiguió.

translation.en: Whoa, whoa, whoa, a baby stole your car?
Is your mask on too tight, Ronnie?
No. I mean... I don't-- I don't think so.
Whoa, baby.
Titus...
put the car down.
Yes. Now.
No, don't throw it!
Well, he put it down.
No cookie for you, Titus! No cookie!
I'm so sorry. Have a nice day.
Okay, let's turn up that music.
- We gotta get off the road. - I know the perfect place.
translation.es: - Hay que irnos de aquí. - Conozco el lugar perfecto.

translation.en: Mother of all things holy.
Our sweet green Earth is living on borrowed time.
My guess puts these creatures at six, seven feet tall.
Some kind of space predator.
Multiple arms, possibly tentacles.
Claws of a wolverine.
They probably shoot spider babies right outta their face.
translation.es: Y disparen arañas bebés de la cara.

translation.en: - - General.
- Neighbors saw a car leave two hours ago. - Get me that plate.
translation.es: - Los vecinos vieron un auto. - Averigua la placa.

translation.en: Put that in a bag with a number on it. Somebody hand me a clipboard.
translation.es: Ponlo en una bolsa con número. ¡Denme una carpeta!

translation.en: General, we got a hit at one of the checkpoints. Something they're calling super freaky- deaky.
translation.es: General, reportan algo superraro en uno de los controles.

translation.en: Define freaky- deaky, Private.
- Babies. Babies. Babies - Babies? Babies? Babies?
What do you mean, babies?
Super- powered alien babies. Cute but deadly.
They... probably shape- shifted into the form of their human victims.
translation.es: Quizá adoptaron la forma de sus víctimas humanas.

translation.en: Put out an APB, all channels!
translation.es: Haz un anuncio en todos los canales.

translation.en: We're looking for infants...
of mass destruction.
You got anything in your date planner about surviving in the woods?
translation.es: ¿Tienes algo en tu agenda para sobrevivir en el bosque?

translation.en: You're talking to Camp Nogiwa's Camper of the Year, gamer boy.
translation.es: Estás hablando con la Acampante del año.

translation.en: Come on, Fearless. Let's set up camp.
Hey. How about a hand? Aren't you supposed to be super strong?
Oh, no, baby, don't-- ! Uh...
But please tell me you brought some toilet paper.
Well, I've got some drive- through receipts in the car.
I was supposed to go to Red Lobster with my girlfriends tonight.
translation.es: Debía ir a cenar con mis amigas esta noche.

translation.en: - Are you gonna be able to fix that thing? - I'd better. Or I'm gonna miss Crabfest.
translation.es: - ¿Podrás arreglarlo? - No quiero perderme el Festilangosta.

translation.en: Besides, it's just a machine. There has to be a way.
translation.es: Además, es una máquina. Tengo que poder.

translation.en: Uh, just seems like we're a little out of our league here, y'know?
Well, all we can do is try, y'know? Put in some effort?
We need to get this done, so we can get back to our science project.
translation.es: para poder volver a nuestra tarea.

translation.en: Think that brain of yours can solve something other than a video game?
translation.es: ¿Puedes resolver algo más que un videojuego?

translation.en: Hey, little guy.
Uh, I wonder what you're thinkin'. I wonder--
You said it, Titus.
Uh! Where have they gone?
Oh! You got me.
Hi.
Radio repair.
Rainbows and Bears.
Oh, come on.
- Titus! Do not drop a tree on your sister. -
translation.es: Titus, no le tires un árbol a tu hermana.

translation.en: - He did that on his own. - He's really getting better.
These pieces are so tiny. I can't see what I'm doing.
translation.es: Las piezas son tan pequeñas que no veo.

translation.en: Let me try something.
Xander, can you make this?
Make big ones.
Oh, man. He's doing it.
That does help.
Look. Spin this one, it fits here. - Okay. I see it. - There we go.
translation.es: - Mira. Gira esta, encaja aquí. Eso es. - Sí, lo veo.

translation.en: Pretty good, Xander.
You did it. Genius.
Did you have any doubt?
Thanks.
Eight, nine, ten. Yup, still got 'em all.
Captain's log. I continue to wander this maze like a rat.
translation.es: Bitácora del capitán. Sigo vagando por el laberinto. Es interminable.

translation.en: It's endless. Dead end.
translation.es: Bitácora del capitán. Sigo vagando por el laberinto. Es interminable. No hay salida.

translation.en: Or not. Captain's log. I hate mazes.
translation.es: O sí. Bitácora del capitán. Odio los laberintos.

translation.en: Bling?
You gotta be kidding me.
You gotta be kidding!
This is our best vantage point to scan the entire town.
translation.es: Es el mejor punto para escanear todo el pueblo.

translation.en: Access the drones.
Are you listening to me?
translation.es: - ¿Me oíste? - Te escucho todo el día.

translation.en: I listen to you all day, Mother.Do you ever listen to me?
translation.es: - ¿Me oíste? - Te escucho todo el día. ¿Tú me oyes a mí?

translation.en: That's a grande mocha half- caf macchiato, no whip, no foam.
translation.es: Un moca grande sin crema y sin espuma.

translation.en: …3, and 4. And 1, and 2, and 3--
Yo yo. Takin' your calls. It's your boy, UP NYC on The Noize 105 FM.
translation.es: Aquí UP NYC en The Noize FM 105 con llamadas al aire.

translation.en: - Hit me up. Tell me what you wanna hear. -
Hey now, don't be shy. You on The Noize.
translation.es: No seas tímido. Estás en The Noize.

translation.en: Who's this?
This is Dr. Arcannis, overlord of cosmic domination.
translation.es: Habla el doctor Arcannis, por la dominación cósmica.

translation.en: Yo, whaddup, Einstein? What song you wanna play on the hit list?
I don't have time for this. I Don't Have Time For This by Dreadlock Killah.
translation.es: - No tengo tiempo. - No tengo tiempo, de Rastah.

translation.en: - That's not what I mean. - That's Not What I Mean by MC Saltshaka.
translation.es: - Eso no. - Eso no, de MC Salero.

translation.en: I am looking for babies.
Looking For My Baby by JJ Squash.
translation.es: Busco a mi bebé, de JJ-Squash.

translation.en: Stop this foolishness.
You will soon be my slaves, and this planet will be a wasteland!
translation.es: Pronto serán mis esclavos y el planeta será mío.

translation.en: Congratulations, my man. You just requested the new jam of the week.
translation.es: Bien, amigo. Pediste el nuevo tema de la semana.

translation.en: - How is that even possible? - You Will Be My Slaves,
translation.es: ¿Cómo es posible? Pronto serán mis esclavos y el planeta será mío, de DJ Eurípides.

translation.en: And This Planet Will Be My Wasteland by DJ Euripides.
translation.es: Pronto serán mis esclavos y el planeta será mío, de DJ Eurípides.

translation.en: At least we put this thing back together, but it's still not working.
translation.es: Pudimos rearmarlo, pero aún no funciona.

translation.en: - Maybe it's a power thing? - The signal is really weak.
translation.es: - Quizá no tiene carga. - La señal es débil.

translation.en: We need to, like, hijack a satellite for this.
Use some NASA- level gear.
translation.es: O usar equipos de la NASA.

translation.en: Let me make a call to NASA. I'll get right on it.
translation.es: Ahora los llamo y les pido.

translation.en: You're not half bad at this stuff when you put your mind to it.
translation.es: No eres tan malo en estas cosas cuando quieres.

translation.en: Uh, thank you?
Maybe it's all the fresh air and trees and bugs and going potty in the woods.
translation.es: Tal vez sea por el aire fresco y el baño natural.

translation.en: Opens up my mind a bit.
Wow. Look at you. Acknowledging there's a real world.
translation.es: Vaya. Mírate, descubriendo el mundo real.

translation.en: Maybe you're not a complete lost cause after all.
translation.es: Quizá no seas una causa perdida.

translation.en: Maybe not.
So... any plans after we graduate, or are you just gonna float around in virtual reality?
translation.es: ¿Harás algo después de graduarnos o vivirás en la realidad virtual?

translation.en: At least in the game world, you don't get called names, flunk a class, or get turned down for prom. It's all about the fun.
translation.es: En los juegos, nadie te burla por reprobar ni te rechaza. Solo nos divertimos.

translation.en: Here in the real world, I've got my fingers crossed for MIT. Majoring in biochemical engineering.
translation.es: Yo espero entrar en MIT para estudiar Ingeniería Bioquímica.

translation.en: Wow. You've got it all planned out.
Well, sure. Even those ducks are charting a course, Reid.
translation.es: Hasta esos patos siguen un curso, Reid.

translation.en: They don't just drift wherever the current goes.
Is that all you're gonna do? Just drift?
I'm sick of working on this. Time to work on a sandwich.
translation.es: Me cansé de esto. Es hora de un sándwich.

translation.en: - Hope you like pastrami. - You guys like pastrami?
Little pastrami on rye. Got some kraut and mustard. I'm making Reubens.
translation.es: Pastrami, pan de centeno, mostaza y repollo.

translation.en: - - Hey, don't get cranky.
Look at these two guys. They're not cranky. Look.
Hi, Mr. Spoon. That's Dr. Spoon from space.
translation.es: - Hola, Cuchara. - Doctor. Y del espacio.

translation.en: Get away from me.
- I have a PhD! -
How about, um...
I'm Colonel Mustard. What's the ruckus?
Please, no fighting. I'm just a moist towelette.
translation.es: Por favor, no peleen, soy solo un aderezo.

translation.en: Don't play with Dr. Spoon like that. You're gonna hurt him.
Hey, let's play peekaboo. - This guy loves peekaboo. - Yeah.
- Peek. Peek. -
Peek. Peekaboo, huh?
- Don't scare him. - Here I go. - You'll set his powers off. - Hmm.
translation.es: - No lo asustes. Activarás sus poderes. - Prepárate.

translation.en: If you can't see my face, where am I?
- You got too big. - Peekaboo!
- I told you not to scare him! - Okay, everybody in the car!
Captain's log: more maze.
This part is different. Maybe it's a way out.
Nope. Just the opposite.
That sounds...
alive.
Looks like Arcannis's monster had some babies.
translation.es: El monstruo de Arcannis tuvo bebés.

translation.en: That's fitting. Killed by babies.
translation.es: Qué paradoja si me matan bebés.

translation.en: Very ironic.
At least he leaves a trail.
Xander! Xander!
- Xander, don't move. -
It's okay, Xander.
Hey! What--
The driver's still in there!
- Hey! The door is stuck! - Wait, hold on. One second, okay?
translation.es: - ¡El conductor está ahí! - La puerta. Un momento, permítame.

translation.en: - Hey! -
Good boy, Titus. Okay, hold on.
Oh, why won't it... budge!
I'm okay. How much milk is that kid drinking?
translation.es: Estoy bien. ¿Cuánta leche bebe ese niño?

translation.en: - - Look at that. These babies could be heroes.
Yay, Titus.
- Or not. - Uh- oh.
What was in there?
Just a lot of priceless artifacts from a museum.
translation.es: Cosas sin valor de un museo.

translation.en: You know, 17th century Ming Dynasty, things that can never be replaced.
translation.es: Objetos irremplazables de la dinastía Ming.

translation.en: - And my house keys were in there. - It's not that long of a drop.
translation.es: Y las llaves de mi casa. Seguro que todo está intacto.

translation.en: - I'm sure everything's fine. -
Okay, pacifiers for everyone.
We better get outta here.
Oh no.
Keep your human skin suits on and your hands where we can see them.
translation.es: No se quiten los trajes de piel humana.

translation.en: Stand down, alien menace!
I'm not an alien menace.
That's just what an alien menace would say.
You shoot any spider babies outta your face, we will take you out.
translation.es: No se atrevan a dispararnos arañas bebés.

translation.en: Do not be swayed by their cute demeanor and chubby cheeks!
translation.es: ¡No se dejen engañar por su simpatía!

translation.en: Quarantine this area right now.
- - No!
Careful. Keep away from their mouth and hands.
translation.es: Cuidado con las manos y la boca.

translation.en: Ew. We've got saliva.
Get a stool sample! Send those diapers to the CDC!
They're just babies! Don't hurt them!
They like Lionel Richie. Mostly his greatest hits.
translation.es: Les gustan los éxitos de Lionel Richie.

translation.en: Well, you've tested human. I just need to know why you're working for them.
translation.es: Comprobamos que son humanos. ¿Por qué trabajan para ellos?

translation.en: This is a big misunderstanding.
All I did was accidentally open up a wormhole by playing a video game.
translation.es: Abrí un agujero de gusano en un videojuego por error.

translation.en: Planet Master? Do you know it?
And who are you calling on this?
The Russians? The French? The French Canadians? The Canadian Russians? Martian communists?
No! But there's someone else you should be worried about.
translation.es: No. Pero deberían preocuparse por alguien más.

translation.en: I can't even believe she told you that.
She did. And then she says to me that she wants to see other people.
translation.es: Y me dijo que quería salir con otra gente.

translation.en: Ouch, that's cold.
So she's single?
What? Did you seriously just say she--
Say what, Nate?
Nate.
HQ--
Hold that thought.
I'm confused here.
We tracked an alien pod to you two,
but all our background searches come up with are Red Lobster, Sephora,
translation.es: pero los resultados de búsqueda fueron restaurantes

translation.en: Pinkberry and a website called acnesolutions.com
translation.es: y tiendas de maquillaje y cosmética.

translation.en: What?  No, that's, uh, I've never heard of...
translation.es: ¿Qué? No, eso es... Nunca busqué eso.

translation.en: In all my days as a Marine, a Navy Seal, LAPD, FBI, and a Girl Scout Leader of the Year,
translation.es: En todos mis años como infante de marina, policía, agente del FBI y exploradora,

translation.en: I've never heard such a load of--
General, we have intruders. They're moving to--
Moving where?
Come back, soldier!
Perimeter, report!
Until I know what's going on, you will do nothing and go nowhere. - Understood? - Let us help.
translation.es: Hasta que sepa qué sucede, se quedarán aquí, ¿entendido?

translation.en: Do nothing, go nowhere.
Who does she think she is? They can't keep us in here.
translation.es: ¿Quién se cree que es? No pueden encerrarnos. Debemos hacer algo...

translation.en: - There's gotta be a way out of-- - Shhh.
translation.es: No pueden encerrarnos. Debemos hacer algo...

translation.en: - I don't hear anything. - Exactly.
It's him, Dr. Arcannis.
We're going for a little ride. Fleech, get them in the sport utility vehicle.
translation.es: Daremos un paseo. Fleech, ponlos en el vehículo.

translation.en: Mark this day in your planet's history, hoomans.
translation.es: Haré historia en su planeta, umanos.

translation.en: - My little helpers are about to make me... - ...the most powerful being in the universe!
translation.es: ¡Mis pequeños ayudantes me convertirán en el ser más poderoso del universo!

translation.en: What is this?
They're gone.
- What? Sh-- Should we go after them? - And do what?
I saw the warning. But I didn't listen. I just wanted to win.
translation.es: Vi la advertencia, pero no le hice caso. Quería ganar.

translation.en: This isn't a game. It's real.
translation.es: Y ya no es un juego, es real.

translation.en: The whole Earth is doomed, and it's my fault.
translation.es: La Tierra está en peligro, y es mi culpa.

translation.en: - Come on. You are Fearless. - No, don't call me that.
translation.es: - Eres Fearless. - No me llames así.

translation.en: I'm not Fearless. I'm useless.
translation.es: No soy intrépido. Soy un inútil.

translation.en: Just my luck. They're teethin'.
I'm not as tasty as I look. Who am I kidding? I'm probably delicious.
translation.es: No soy tan sabroso como parezco. ¿Qué digo? Debo ser delicioso.

translation.en: No use fighting it. There's no way out of this one.
translation.es: No vale la pena pelear. No hay salida.

translation.en: I'm-- I'm never gonna see my babies again.
translation.es: No volveré a ver a mis bebés.

translation.en: I can plan a Red Cross food drive, a homecoming dance, I can raise $8,000 to save the elephants.
translation.es: Puedo planear eventos solidarios, bailes, recaudar $8000 para salvar elefantes,

translation.en: But this? I'm-- I'm all out of ideas, Reid.
This would be so much easier if it was a video game.
translation.es: Sería más fácil si fuera un videojuego.

translation.en: Wait a minute.
What if this was a video game?
What would you do?
I don't know. l'd look around for tools, for power- ups.
I wouldn't give up.
You know what? I've been living my whole life through a screen.
translation.es: Viví toda la vida a través de una pantalla.

translation.en: What good is it being Fearless in a fake world?
It's time to start being Fearless out here, where it counts.
translation.es: Es hora de hacerlo aquí, donde importa.

translation.en: Wow. Somebody just got off the couch.
Let's find a way outta here, huh?
Wait a minute. I can't believe I didn't think of it before.
translation.es: No puedo creer que no se nos ocurrió.

translation.en: That's a sat phone.
It's a super powerful walkie- talkie.
They link to satellites. NASA- level gear.
It could boost our signal. You can fix the communicator. Yes! Now let's go stop Grinchface.
translation.es: - Nos ayudará a reparar el comunicador. - A detener al cara de Grinch.

translation.en: Game on.
General. You're gonna have to trust me. We're the good guys,
translation.es: General, confíe en mí. - Detendremos a los malos. - Si llegamos a tiempo.

translation.en: - and we're gonna stop the bad guys. - If we can catch them in time.
translation.es: - Detendremos a los malos. - Si llegamos a tiempo.

translation.en: Whoa! The Obsidian.
It's even cooler in person.
You can take a selfie later!
Watch the road!  Whoa! Shrimp!
Didn't you say you've ridden a motorcycle before?
- Yes, in Planet Master. - What?
Okay, it's now or never.
Sorry, this is a lot different than a rocket bike.
Here goes.
I think we're on.
Hello? Come in, Captain. Captain, can you hear us?
- - This is Lightspeed. Good to hear your voice again. - We got him! - Yeah!
translation.es: - Aquí Lightspeed. Qué alegría escucharte. - ¡Lo logramos!

translation.en: - Arcannis has your babies. - What?
They're on The Obsidian, but we won't let them get away.  I can finally pinpoint your location.
translation.es: - No dejaremos que se escape. - Tengo su ubicación.

translation.en: Do not let Arcannis absorb those babies' powers, or Earth is doomed.
translation.es: Que Arcannis no absorba los poderes o acabará con la Tierra.

translation.en: Okay, we can do this.
I played every level. I know every inch of that ship. Arcannis is no match for my expert--
translation.es: Pasé todos los niveles. Conozco la nave. Arcannis no es rival...

translation.en: - Oh! Swallowed a bug. -
- Are we gonna catch them? - Yes, we will.
If we land on top of it, we can get inside through the engine intake ports.
translation.es: Aterrizaremos encima para entrar por el motor.

translation.en: Wait, what?
- Trust me, I've done this before. - Not in real life.
translation.es: - Descuida, ya lo hice. - No en la vida real.

translation.en: Get ready to jump. I will never be ready to jump!
translation.es: - Prepárate para saltar. - Nunca estaré lista.

translation.en: Or we can also go in this way.
If Fearless isn't giving up, then neither am I.
translation.es: Si Fearless no se rinde, yo tampoco.

translation.en: I just need a way out.
Baby Bottle Bonus.
Wherever heroes are needed.
Fastest nipple in the galaxy. Take that!
translation.es: El pezón más rápido de la galaxia. ¡Tomen!

translation.en: Time to pick up the kids.
Oh my God.
What? Huh? What?
Sweet George Washington.
Looks like those kids were right.
- I need birds in the air now! - Yes, ma'am.
No lobster- headed space invader gets a drop on me.
translation.es: Ningún invasor espacial se meterá conmigo.

translation.en: - Yes, ma'am. - If he thinks a ray gun and pointy collar makes him king of the moon men, well, ha.
translation.es: Si cree que una pistola de rayos lo hará rey de los hombres de la luna,

translation.en: He's never tangled with the human spirit.
translation.es: nunca se enfrentó al espíritu humano.

translation.en: - Okay, I'm done. - Yes, ma'am.
Good.
Connect the chairs to the machine.
translation.es: Conecta las sillas a la máquina.

translation.en: The absorption chamber is ready.
Their little powers have blossomed so much.
This will be an excellent harvest.
The isolated gene combinations from their DNA will be fed directly into this implant.
translation.es: La combinación genética de su ADN se transmitirá a este implante.

translation.en: Activate The Extrapolator. I will be in my cocoon.
translation.es: Activa el extrapolador. Estaré en mi capullo.

translation.en: No, go to the Settings menu, then Preferences, then Power Level.
translation.es: Ve a Configuración, Preferencias, Nivel de poder.

translation.en: Not Tools! Power Level!
Yes.
I can feel it.
So what's the plan?
You find the babies, I'm gonna stop this ship.
translation.es: Busca a los bebés, mientras detengo la nave.

translation.en: And how do we do that? Simple.
All right, so I've memorized the scheme of this place.
You're gonna keep going through this tunnel,
then you're gonna end up at a bunch of scary mechanical objects.
translation.es: hasta toparte con un montón de objetos aterradores.

translation.en: Just gotta get through 'em.
- That sounds dangerous. - It is.  It is.
Do not touch anything, okay?
Go to Lab A, not Lab B, because that's the one where he's growing the monsters and mutating the animals.
translation.es: Ve al laboratorio A, no al B, ese es el de los animales mutantes.

translation.en: I think there's a two- headed squid in there with swords for hands.
translation.es: Hay un calamar de dos cabezas con tentáculos filosos.

translation.en: - It's okay. You'll be fine. - I think we should switch jobs.
We can't. I'm the only one who knows how to get past security lasers and the security drones
translation.es: No. Solo yo sé cómo pasar los láseres y drones de seguridad.

translation.en: and the security bees,
which is not a technical term, they're just bees.
translation.es: No es un término técnico. Son abejas.

translation.en: Are you serious?
But that's a lot of bees.
I'll sabotage the flight controls,
then I'll cut through the torture chamber and the racquetball court,
translation.es: pasaré por la cámara de tortura y la cancha de ráquetbol y...

translation.en: and I-- I don't know what else, uh...
translation.es: pasaré por la cámara de tortura y la cancha de ráquetbol y... No sé qué más.

translation.en: Yeah?
- I hate this plan. - See you in five.
We're gonna laugh about this, I promise.
- The aircraft is in sight. - All right Jersey, stay focused.
translation.es: - Lo tenemos en la mira. - Manténganse alerta.

translation.en: Let's keep it tight. There are civilians on board.
translation.es: No se distraigan. Hay civiles a bordo.

translation.en: Let's fire a warning shot.
This is by order of the U.S. government.
translation.es: El gobierno de EE. UU. le ordena que aterrice

translation.en: You will follow us to a landing sight or be forced down.
translation.es: El gobierno de EE. UU. le ordena que aterrice o dispararemos.

translation.en: - He's out of control! - Break away! Break away!
This guy's not coming down quietly. We gotta take this thing down.
General, we are awaiting missile authorization.
No, no, no, no! No! Oh, my gosh. I found you guys.
I fear for my life, but this is way better than a game.
translation.es: Temo por mi vida, pero es mejor que el juego.

translation.en: All right, hands up!
All of them...
- - Where I can see them.
That is all of them, right?
Land this ship, now.
Whoa! Oh! Yeah. More of that.
Holy guacamole! This thing's a lot of fun.
You found them! So good news, bad news: the fastest way to land this ship is to crash it.
translation.es: ¡Los encontraste! La forma más rápida de aterrizar es estrellarnos.

translation.en: We've gotta get someplace safe. Here, take them.
Hold fire! Someone's taking it down from the inside.
translation.es: ¡No disparen! Alguien lo derribará desde adentro.

translation.en: Oh, no. No.
We've gotta escape. Escape in a pod of some kind, maybe--
translation.es: Debemos escapar en una cápsula o...

translation.en: Hang on to something!
Your pod has been deployed.
Um... thanks.
The power courses through my veins.
translation.es: El poder corre por mis venas.

translation.en: Better, stronger,
supercharged.
The poopy diaper just hit the fan.
translation.es: El pañal sucio nos golpeó la cara.

translation.en: And poop just got real.
translation.es: Y la caca se volvió real.

translation.en: Now that I've been freed from that insipid game by that foolish boy,
translation.es: Ahora que ese tonto me liberó del juego aburrido,

translation.en: I shall conquer your planet.
You'll have to go through me first.
translation.es: Me tendrás que vencer a mí primero.

translation.en: I see you brought an army.
So did I.
Fire!
You are insects.
And you will be destroyed like insects.
Today I declare myself King of Earth.
translation.es: Hoy me declaro el rey de la Tierra.

translation.en: First order of business, we are changing that name.
Oh, this is bad. There's gotta be a way to stop him.
- We've gotta get these babies to safety. - What's wrong with them?
translation.es: - Hay que llevarlos a un lugar seguro. - ¿Qué les pasa?

translation.en: I don't know.
Ever since they were in that machine, they've been totally out of it.
translation.es: Sin sus poderes, están fuera de sí.

translation.en: Keep them safe. I have an idea.
translation.es: Mantenlos a salvo. Tengo una idea.

translation.en: - - Wait. Reid, are you crazy?
Be careful!
I still don't wanna die like this! No! No! No!
What is that horrible--
You mock me with your vehicle of frozen confections?
translation.es: ¿Quieres engañarme con tu vehículo de dulces?

translation.en: No!
Ah, the boy who's been in my way.
translation.es: El chico que se metió en mi camino.

translation.en: You've got what you want now. We're no threat to you.
translation.es: Ya tienes lo que quieres. No somos una amenaza. ¡Vete!

translation.en: Just leave. Go master another planet.
translation.es: Ya tienes lo que quieres. No somos una amenaza. ¡Vete! Conquista otro planeta.

translation.en: Ah. There they are.
I wondered where the little saplings had gone to.
I'm sorry, but I think it's time I end the Lightspeed lineage for good.
translation.es: Es hora de acabar con el linaje Lightspeed de una vez.

translation.en: I won't let you touch them!
I will destroy anyone I please.
translation.es: Destruiré a quien se me antoje.

translation.en: Especially those babies.
Now step aside!
- Not gonna happen, green beans. - Huh?
I made this mess, and it's up to me to clean it up.
translation.es: Yo provoqué esto y voy a resolverlo.

translation.en: And if that means standing in your way, no matter what…
translation.es: Y si debo interponerme en tu camino,

translation.en: that's what I'm gonna do.
Wow, that was quite a speech. What are you gonna do, gamer boy?
translation.es: Vaya, ¡qué gran discurso! ¿Qué harás, jugador? ¿Vencerme con palabritas?

translation.en: - Shoot me down with a speech? -
It was inspiring.
I begin my reign with a show of force.
An example to those who would dare cross me.
translation.es: Un ejemplo para quienes se atrevan a enfrentarme.

translation.en: Any more pathetic attempts at being a hero will be crushed.
translation.es: Aplastaré a cualquiera que intente hacerse el héroe.

translation.en: Crushed to dust.
So you will learn the meaning of being fearless.
translation.es: Para que aprendan el significado de ser intrépidos.

translation.en: What?
Kira!
Ah! It's not possible!
She's breaking through the barrier!
Reid!
- Titus? - Goo- goo- ga.
The voice of Vin Diesel.
- High five. - High five.
They got 'em on the run people! Attack!
You glow, girl.
Yeah, Kira!
Wow. A natural- born gamer.
- - Hop in. Let's do some damage.
Yeah you better run. Little toad.
translation.es: Sí, será mejor que corras, renacuajo.

translation.en: - - Oh, no! Make it stop!
She can just do everything now, can't she?
There's something on Arcannis's neck.
translation.es: Arcannis tiene algo en el cuello.

translation.en: If we take that out, I think we take his power.
translation.es: Si se lo quitamos, también sus poderes.

translation.en: - She doesn't understand. - Yes, she does.
You've got your daddy's eyes. And they shoot lightning death blasts.
translation.es: Tienes los ojos de tu papá. Y disparan rayos.

translation.en: So just remember what he taught you. You got this.
No!
Yes!
Bullseye.
I can feel the power leaving.
translation.es: Siento que el poder se va.

translation.en: You can't steal superpowers.
No! No!
Noooo!
No!
Better late than never!
Boy, that's a horrible catchphrase. Strike that.
Captain! You're here!
You know what, frog face? You made me miss Crabfest. I haven't missed Crabfest in seven years.
translation.es: Cara de rana, no me perdí un Festilangosta en siete años.

translation.en: - So I'm not in a good mood at all. -
translation.es: Así que no estoy de buen humor.

translation.en: Hey, she's good. What game is she from?
No, she's all real.
I'm here to assist, general.
These must be your kids.
Seems like things are… well in hand.
translation.es: Parece que todo está en buenas manos.

translation.en: Where's Kira?
She's the one without any...
powers.
Dada!
Hey. You got 'em.
- Dada! -
- They grow up so fast. - Hmm.
Where's the pacifier? It's time to calm them down.
translation.es: ¿Dónde está el chupete? Es hora de calmarse.

translation.en: Um... no pacifiers. Does anyone have any Lionel Richie?
translation.es: No sé, pero ¿alguien tiene algo de Lionel Richie?

translation.en: I got a Commodores album in my car. Not the same thing, private.
translation.es: - Tengo uno de los Commodores. - No es lo mismo, soldado.

translation.en: You! Play some Lionel Richie like your life depended on it.
translation.es: Tú. Pon algo de Lionel Richie como si tu vida dependiera de eso.

translation.en: Wouldn't be the first time.
- We don't need an ambulance. - How about some blankets?
- What for? - I don't know.
We just always give you blankets.
You know, this was a crazy weekend, but it might've been the best one of my life.
translation.es: Fue un fin de semana loco, pero creo que fue el mejor de mi vida.

translation.en: Really? It wasn't on your schedule.
I think you kinda owe me a crab dinner.
translation.es: Me debes una cena de langosta.

translation.en: - Yeah? - Yeah.
All right.  You got it.
But we still never got to that science project.
translation.es: Pero aún no hicimos el proyecto de ciencias.

translation.en: Hey, you two. I think you might have dropped this.
Or maybe we did.
It is perfect. And nothing like I planned.
translation.es: Es perfecto. Y diferente a lo que planeé.

translation.en: Thank you, Fearless. You saved the day when I couldn't. Not everyone would've done that.
translation.es: Gracias, Fearless, salvaste el día cuando yo no pude. No cualquiera.

translation.en: A few days ago, I wouldn't have done that. The real world is a whole new level.
translation.es: Hace unos días, no lo habría hecho. El mundo real es otro nivel.

translation.en: I couldn't have gotten here without help from Buckethead.
Wait a second. Buckethead?
Oh. You guys know each other?
- What's up, Reid? - What? How?
You know I got your back.
Who do you think got him his Baby Bottle Bonus?
translation.es: ¿Quién crees que ganó el Bonus de biberón?

translation.en: I guess we've finished the final level together, Elliot.
We sure did. We did it together.
Fearless and the Finisher.
Bye, Xander.
- Think happy thoughts. -
Titus. One for the road?
- And you. -
- Hmm. - I'll miss you.
Hang on to that, you two, in case we need you again.
translation.es: Atentos por si volvemos a necesitarlos.

translation.en: - Where you headed next? - Wherever heroes are needed.
Can you believe we got an A+ on our science project? That's a relief.
translation.es: - Sacamos un sobresaliente en el proyecto. - Menos mal.

translation.en: Otherwise my parents never would've forgiven me for trashing the house.
translation.es: Mis padres jamás me habrían perdonado por destrozar la casa.

translation.en: - And we finally got our date. -
We really bent the laws of reality this weekend.
translation.es: Desafiamos las leyes de la realidad.

translation.en: What if we're just characters in someone else's game?
translation.es: ¿Y si somos personajes en el juego de otro?

translation.en: I hardly know what's real anymore.
translation.es: Ya no sé qué es real.

translation.en: This? This is real enough for me.
translation.es: Esto es suficientemente real para mí.

translation.en: Game on, Fearless!
Looks like we're taking it to the next level.
Bye- bye.
